name: Deogen
evidence:
Spirit Box 
Ghost Writing 
D.O.T.S. Projector
trait:
**You can __NOT HIDE__ from this ghost** 
 
The deogen is extremely fast if it can not see you, but if it has line of sight of you, it will move very slowly. 
 
This means **you have to loop the ghost** during a hunt. 
 
You can't get the Deogen till you're Prestige0-Level30 

Can Hunt at 40% Sanity. Does not speed up over time in LoS.
ability: Unique Spirit Box response for the Deogen only. Ask the Spirit Box any question when standing within 1m of the Deogen, to have a 33% chance of getting it.
